articles.author: Jonathan Vanian
articles.title: Europe is investigating Elon Musk's X about Israel-Hamas misinformation, violence on the app - CNBC
articles.description: The European Commission is investigating whether X is complying with the Digital Services Act for its handling of Israel-Hamas war misinformation and violence.
articles.content: A European regulator said Thursday that it sent a formal request to X, formerly known as Twitter, to obtain information related to the spread of illegal content and disinformation on the service amid… [+2889 chars]
